attributes.action: Bring back retirement to 60 for women who have paid into the system for 30 years
attributes.additional_details:
Bring back retirement age to 60 for women who have paid into the system for over 30 years.  If you have paid the money in, you should be able to take it out.
Please sign this petition each extra year worked is a loss of approximatley £5000, this is YOUR money PLEASE sign now and stop this government from moving the goalposts
